§6§lJohn Ellipsoid and the Center of Mass of a Convex Body§r

§8§oHan Huang§r

§72018§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oIn the original version, we've shown that there existsa convex body K\u2282\u211d^n such that its center of mass does not lie in the John ellipsoid B_K inflated cn times about the center of B_K for some universal constant c>0. This
time we replaced the constant cn by (1-C\u221a(log(n)/n))n for some universal constant C>0, which is sharp since it cannot exceed n. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1703.02173\u00a7r
